1.title: Teenagers from Outer Space

episode of.title: The New Uncle Gregory Horror Hour (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Space Teen Derek seeks to make a new home on earth while avoiding the space authorities-with their disintegrator rays and giant "gargon" monsters. Meanwhile, Uncle Gregory prepares to raise funds with a Teen Block Party-and a "Grow Your Own Gargon" kit!

2.title: The Beast of Yucca Flats

episode of.title: The New Uncle Gregory Horror Hour (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Tor Johnson is transformed by an atomic blast into... Tor Johnson. In a ripped shirt. Tor then murders some of the least-alert people in the Yucca Flats region. Meanwhile, Uncle Gregory leaves Chant in charge of the show while he visits a local art gallery.

3.title: Horror Express

episode of.title: The New Uncle Gregory Horror Hour (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Prehistoric, murderin', monster is loose on a train. Meanwhile, Uncle Gregory is very, very excited that this movie features the star of 1970's smash hit Kojak (Telly Savalas), and gets a bit more involved than he should.

4.title: A Bucket of Blood

episode of.title: The New Uncle Gregory Horror Hour (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Uncle Gregory suddenly remembers he is a brilliant artist - and everyone suffers. Features an interview with guest artist Joey Borovicka.

5.title: Dementia 13

episode of.title: The New Uncle Gregory Horror Hour (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: In this bloody episode the body count piles up as Uncle Gregory's late night garage sale attracts the curious and the strange while the night's movie, "Dementia 13", keeps us guessing, "What is she doing with those dolls?" Many may enter but but none shall leave.

6.title: Chant's Creepy Cartoon Closet

episode of.title: The New Uncle Gregory Horror Hour (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Uncle Gregory goes to visit a local convention and leaves Chant in charge of the show -- with a selection of vintage cartoons that will scare your pants off. Features "There's Good Boos Tonight," "Skulls and Sculls," "The Fresh Vegetable Mystery" and "The Sunshine Makers."

7.title: Scrooge: A Christmas Extravaganza!

episode of.title: The New Uncle Gregory Horror Hour (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: In this Festive episode we end our year with laughter and screams as Scrooge and all his cronies bore us into Christmas submission. Filled with loads us creepy fun, I show you how to make paper chains, how to hang your stockings with care, and how NOT to prepare plum pudding. Let me help you blood-let all that Christmas cheer inside of you!

8.title: The Giant Gila Monster

episode of.title: The New Uncle Gregory Horror Hour (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Uncle Gregory has been comatose since his New Year's blow-out. He attempts to get back into physical shape while watching a movie about a giant lizard.

9.title: The Screaming Skull

episode of.title: The New Uncle Gregory Horror Hour (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Uncle Gregory is very excited about the movie they are about to show - The Screaming Skull - until Chant makes a startling announcement.

10.title: Cat-Women of the Moon

episode of.title: The New Uncle Gregory Horror Hour (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Uncle Gregory is attending another convention - and Chant the Skull is nowhere to be found. Your favorite undead Uncle encounters zombies, gamers, death and and cat-women while searching for Chant in this exciting episode.

11.title: Drive-In Massacre

episode of.title: The New Uncle Gregory Horror Hour (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Uncle Gregory and Chant "visit" a drive-in theater and "enjoy" the film "Drive-In Massacre" - as well as lots of creepy old trailers.

12.title: Carnival of Souls

episode of.title: The New Uncle Gregory Horror Hour (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Uncle Gregory decides to have a carnival in honor of "Carnival of Souls" - and it doesn't go so well. Is anyone surprised?

imdb.plot outline: Look out! He's back! Armed with a stolen camera and more creepy, crawly, locally-produced-and-public-domain film goodness, your own favorite undead Uncle is champing at the bit to get back on the air and bring you the classic horror and sci-fi that you want-nay!-deserve!
imdb.title: The New Uncle Gregory Horror Hour
akas: The New Uncle Gregory Horror Hour (United States)
plot: Look out! He's back! Armed with a stolen camera and more creepy, crawly, locally-produced-and-public-domain film goodness, your own favorite undead Uncle is champing at the bit to get back on the air and bring you the classic horror and sci-fi that you want-nay!-deserve!::J.Hall
